org.apache.xerces.xs.datatypes
Interface XSDecimal

public interface XSDecimal

Interface to expose the value of 'decimal' and related datatypes.

Version:
$Id: XSDecimal.java 447250 2006-09-18 05:27:17Z mrglavas $
